title: ΕΞΙΣ gods, ghosts and battered cellphones
description: Does love have an expiration date? What if family could be replaced? If a deaf man cried prophecies, would anyone listen? What to do if you've found the keys to the apocalypse? What if gods and humans could trade roles? Strange is a matter of perception. Opportunity or folly, you be the judge.Available at eTreasures: http://store-67a3d.mybigcommerce.com/...
author: Anne Carly Abad
